TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PageSetupDialog extends System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog
Public NotInheritable Class PageSetupDialog Inherits CommonDialog
public ref class PageSetupDialog sealed : System::Windows::Forms::CommonDialog

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.ComponentModel.DefaultProperty("Document")]
[<System.ComponentModel.DefaultProperty("Document")>]

summary.span: 允许用户更改与页面相关的打印设置，包括边距和纸张方向。

span.span: Enables users to change page-related print settings, including margins and paper orientation.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 对话框修改给定的 和 信息 。The dialog box modifies the and information for a given . 用户可以启用对话框部分来处理打印和边距;纸张方向、大小和源;并显示 "帮助" 和 "网络" 按钮。The user can enable sections of the dialog box to manipulate printing and margins; paper orientation, size, and source; and to show Help and network buttons. 属性定义用户可选择的最小边距。The property defines the minimum margins a user can select. 创建类的实例时 ，读/写属性将设置为初始值。When you create an instance of the class, the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. 由于 需要显示页设置，因此需要在 调用之前设置、或 属性 ; 否则，将发生异常。Because a needs page settings to display, you need to set the , , or property before calling ; otherwise, an exception will occur. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用 、 和 属性。The following code example demonstrates the using the , , and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将其放在包含名为、名为的的窗体 `Button1` `ListBox1` 和名为的的 `PageSetupDialog1` 窗体中。To run this example, place it in a form containing a named `Button1`, a named `ListBox1`, and a named `PageSetupDialog1`. 确保该按钮的 click 事件已连接到此示例中的事件处理方法。Ensure the button's click event is connected to the event-handling method in this example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialogExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialogExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialogExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialogExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialogExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialogExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果应用程序在上运行，则将此属性设置为 `true` 不起作用 [!INCLUDE[windowsver](~/includes/windowsver-md.md)] 。Setting this property to `true` has no effect if the application is running on [!INCLUDE[windowsver](~/includes/windowsver-md.md)]. 将不会显示 " **打印机** " 按钮。The **Printer** button will not be shown.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示以毫米显示时，边距设置是否应在百分之一英寸与毫米之间自动转换。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the margin settings, when displayed in millimeters, should be automatically converted to and from hundredths of an inch.

value.span: 如果将自动转换边距，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the margins should be automatically converted; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类测量 以百分之一英寸 为单位，但允许用户根据运行应用程序的系统的区域性设置，用英寸或毫米设置边距。The class measures in hundredths of an inch, but the allows users to set margins in inches or millimeters depending on the culture settings for the system running the application. 在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中，你应将此属性设置为（ `true` 如果你的应用程序可用于以毫米度量文档边距的区域性）。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, you should set this property to `true` if your application could be used in cultures that measure document margins in millimeters. 如果你要自行执行此转换，则在版本2.0 之前的 .NET Framework 版本中，你应使用的默认值 `false` 。If you are doing this conversion yourself, as was required in versions of the .NET Framework earlier than version 2.0, you should use the default value of `false`.
